gemfire::TypeHelper

gemfire::TypeHelper Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

This namespace contains type traits helper structs/classes to determine type information at compile time using typename.

Useful for templates in particular.

Helper type traits and other structs/classes to determine type information at compile time using typename. Useful for templates in particular.
